Download CV

Luís Melo

UX/UI Design, Web Development & Photography

I am a Portuguese UX/UI designer and front-end developer, with experience in backend development, confident in creating useful, clean and user-centeric web and mobile experiences.
Similarly, I have experience implementing UX strategies, web and mobile standards, in addition to usability rules, in order to make applications and websites useful, goal-oriented and usable.

When not coding or designing, then I am probably hiking or geocaching: I really enjoy nature, its sense of freedom and its limitless possibilities.

As an amateur landscape photographer, I see and recognize this interconnected complexity and, as a coder, I perceive the underlying simplicity and harmony.

This is what i do

colors, shapes, code... I love it!

Saudaçor S.A.

Code / Design

Description

Saudaçor, S.A. website design and development using Wordpress. Saudaçor is an anonymous society corporation of strictly public funds, that provides services of general economic interest in the health field. This project was development while working at Saudaçor.

Tech: HTML5, CSS3 - SASS, Javascript, Wordpress (Theme from scratch)

View project

Artistas Lusos

Code

Description

Artistas Lusos consists in an online platform that provides a way to create a repository of Portuguese descendants artists from around the world, showing their work.

Design: Rúben Ramos
Tech: HTML5, CSS3 - SASS, AngularJS, PHP - REST API

View project

Prorural+

Code / Design

Description

A project developed during my internship at at Cybermap - Internet e Sistemas de Informação , this project page provides specific information/documents and official press releases, news, alerts and other content for the Prorural+ program.

Tech: DotNetNuke CMS

View project

PE - Projetos de Engenharia

Code / Design

Description

Founded in 2000, PE is a civil construction firm whose projects involve the coordination, supervision and auditing of construction projects.

Tech: PHP (Yii Framework)

View project

Toque Reservado - Repair Management Platform

Code / Design

Description

This website has the intent to support the electronics store “Toque Reservado” in the repairs management with some fundamental features such as, repairs search engine, user management, statistics and invoice release. The core of this platform consists in the ability to create, edit, delete and deliver the repairs.

Tech: PHP (Yii Framework)

View project

Folk Group "Doce Esperança"

Photography

Description

Photographic work for the CD release of the Folk Group “Doce Esperança” - Terceira Island, Azores.

Photography work: Luís Melo

Graphics, recording, mixing and mastering: Emiliano Toste

Artistic Director: Aida Barbosa

View project

Client testimonials

the quality proof is in the clients words

P.E. - Projetos de Engenharia

A digital portfolio available for everyone is a very important mean of comunication for a company in order to exhibit its work, and that was a major need for PE - Projetos de Engenharia. Luís' work was essential to create our digital archive which final result exceeded our expectations, contributing for a better divulgation of our work, services and skills.

Tânia Lemos

Great service. Luís had the hability to capture all the unique moments that made our day a very special one. There are moments and memories that will remain in our lives forever.

Scouts - 631

There were several scouts' events that had a lack of advertising elements to help promoting and gather enough funds for our group, and Luis's work was essential to reach as many people as possible. We had a great adherence from the public that joined the events, allowing us to help the comunity and give continous support to our troopers.
